User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Smart Study MPSE application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

fullName.description: The full name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

mobileNumber.description: The mobile number of the user.

role.description: The role of the user (e.g., Student, Admin).

Admin.title: Admin
Admin.description: Represents an administrator of the Smart Study MPSE application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Admin entity.

Paper.title: Paper
Paper.description: Represents a paper or subject in the Smart Study MPSE application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Paper entity.

name.description: The name of the paper or subject (e.g., Paper 1, Mathematics).

description.description: A short description of the paper (max 100 words).

paperNumber.description: The number of the paper for ordering (e.g., 1, 2, 3).

Tab.title: Tab
Tab.description: Represents a tab or chapter within a paper.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Tab entity.

name.description: The name of the tab (e.g., Chapter 1, Ancient History).

SubFolder.title: SubFolder
SubFolder.description: Represents a sub-folder within a tab.

id.description: Unique identifier for the SubFolder entity.

paperId.description: Denormalized reference to Paper for easier queries.

PdfDocument.title: PdfDocument
PdfDocument.description: Represents a PDF document available in the Smart Study MPSE application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the PdfDocument entity.

name.description: The name of the PDF document.

description.description: A description of the PDF document.

googleDriveLink.description: The Google Drive link to the PDF document.

paperId.description: Denormalized reference to Paper for easier queries.

tabId.description: Denormalized reference to Tab for easier queries.

accessType.description: The access type of the PDF document (Free or Paid).

price.description: The price of the PDF if it is 'Paid'.

Combo.title: Combo
Combo.description: Represents a purchasable or free combo of multiple PDF documents.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Combo entity.

name.description: The name of the PDF combo.

description.description: A short description of the combo.

accessType.description: The access type of the combo.

price.description: The price of the combo if it is 'Paid'.

pdfIds.description: An array of PdfDocument IDs included in this combo.

imageUrl.description: URL for the combo's background image.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. Accessible only by the user and admins.
Collection to indicate admin roles. Existence of a document grants admin privileges.
Stores tabs or chapters associated with a specific paper.
Stores sub-folders associated with a specific tab.
Stores PDF documents associated with a specific sub-folder.
Stores PDF combo packages that can be free or paid.
